post.text: Today - I outlined a plan for American economic revival - it is bold, ambitious, forward-looking plan to massively INCREASE JOBS, WAGES, INCOMES and opportunities for the people of our country!

comment.author: Aaron
comment.text: If the current criminal regime had done this Ford wouldn't be moving billions of dollars and thousands of jobs to Mexico...plus all the supporting companys who supply parts to Ford every one forgets about

replies.author: Ashlee
replies.text: Name all the companies in Mexico and the number of employees they have. Go!

replies.author: Aaron
replies.text: spoken well brent, I understand when I went on her page she lives in mexico...she want all of our American jobs

replies.author: Paul
replies.text: This is not what Ford is doing. Trump is making false statements to get people riled up again.

replies.author: Thomas
replies.text: I worked for the largest truck manufacturer in the U.S. I know they have built 3 plants and moved 3500 jobs to Mexico
